definition: classics/sacred book/scripture/to pass through/to undergo/to bear/to endure/warp (textile)/longitude/menstruation/channel (TCM)/abbr. for economics 經濟|经济[jing1 ji4]
to receive/to accept/to suffer/subjected to/to bear/to stand/pleasant/(passive marker)

sentences.english: China-ASEAN relations have withstood the test of crises and disasters.
sentences.chinese: 中國和東盟的關係經受住了風雨災禍的考驗。

sentences.english: You can live through anything for a year, I figured.
sentences.chinese: 我覺得，人可以經受住任何事情在一年的時間裏。

sentences.english: You have to have success and failure.
sentences.chinese: 你必須經受成功與失敗的體驗。

sentences.english: Therefore, Q1 must withstand a gate-to-source voltage higher than this value.
sentences.chinese: 因此，Q1必須經受門源極電壓高於這個值。

sentences.english: Many small firms did not weather the storm of the recession.
sentences.chinese: 許多小公司沒能經受住這次經濟衰退的風波。

sentences.english: The resolve of our nation is still being tested.
sentences.chinese: 我國的決心仍在經受考驗。

sentences.english: Those who climb the Western Steps experience a more rugged climb.
sentences.chinese: 而選擇攀登西面梯道，則要經受崎嶇不平的梯級。

sentences.english: No benefactions can make up for the change in character the city has suffered.
sentences.chinese: 捐款決不能彌補城市所經受的性質上的變化。

sentences.english: Naturally, faint-hearted investors failed the test.
sentences.chinese: 當然，那些膽怯的投資者未能經受住市場的考驗。

sentences.english: A-form pylons are designed to withstand earthquake forces .
sentences.chinese: 型框架式塔架設計中考慮塔架能夠經受地震力的作用。

sentences.english: Abraham's faith withstands many a trial.
sentences.chinese: 亞伯拉罕的信仰經受了多重考驗。

sentences.english: Here are five timeless management laws that have stood the test of time.
sentences.chinese: 這裏是能經受時間考研的五條永恆的管理法則。

sentences.english: We've suffered an agonising seven years which has ruined the lives and health of my family.
sentences.chinese: 我們已經經受了家人生命和健康逝去的痛苦的七年。

sentences.english: The flowers bud will weather the attacks from cold wind and rain, making it way blossom into the fair spring.
sentences.chinese: 讓含苞的花蕾經受住寒風冷雨，綻放在明媚的春天。

sentences.english: He'd tolerated two rounds of chemo, the central line catheters and bone marrow biopsies.
sentences.chinese: 他已經經受了兩輪的化療。

sentences.english: Fluffy cotton candy, who survive the sweet taste.
sentences.chinese: 蓬鬆的棉花糖，誰經受得住那香甜的滋味。
